articles.author: Rebecca Borg
articles.title: John Cena’s selfless act breaks record - news.com.au
articles.description: Just when we thought iconic actor and wrestling legend John Cena had done it all, the American superstar has managed to add another achievement to his list.
articles.content:
Just when we thought iconic actor and wrestling legend John Cena had done it all, the American superstar has managed to add another achievement to his list.
